author: By GARY GERARD HAMILTON Associated Press
title: McConaughey says stay home now, great things may lie ahead
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Matthew McConaughey has gone from advertising for going out and driving to selling people on staying home, and says that successfully navigating this crisis could bring great things from Hollywood and humanity.
content:
